name: fbsql_fetch_array
purpose: Fetch a result row as an associative array, a numeric array, or both

return.description:
Returns an array that corresponds to the fetched row, or FALSE
   if there are no more rows.If two or more columns of the result have the same field names,
   the last column will take precedence. To access the other column(s)
   of the same name, you must the numeric index of the column or
   make an alias for the column.
   
    

select t1.f1 as foo t2.f1 as bar from t1, t2
